text: Pelayo Roza Fonticiella (born 4 May 1996) is a Spanish sprint canoeist. He won a bronze medal at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.K-4 1000 m results Also he won a bronze medal at the 2018 Canoe Sprint European Championships. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Spanish male canoeists Category:Living people Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:Sportspeople from Gijón
title: Pelayo Roza
